# behaviour.change.analysis

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides functions to analyse behavioural questionnaire data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of behaviour.change.analysis from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("idem-lab/behaviour.change.analysis")
```
